headline.1: Dismissal of Iranian Science Minister Rallies Both Support and Opposition for Moderate President Rohani

short_description.0: Now is the time for the West -- whether NATO, the United States, or individual European states --to provide or sell the high-tech weaponry Ukraine needs to defend itself effectively. The argument against such a move -- that it would provoke a Russian escalation--is no longer valid, now that Russia has escalated. A well-armed Ukraine could stop Putin from embarking on any of these more alarming scenarios.
short_description.1: The impeachment of Iranian Minister of Science Reza Faraji Dana by the conservative-dominated Iranian Parliament on August 20 has been a key event for both sides -- a slip in the political tectonics that could yield seismic waves throughout the country's political landscape.

authors.0: Alexander Motyl, ContributorUkrainian-American Political Scientist, Rutgers University
